Welcome to the inaugural 2025 Postdoctoral Symposium!

Join us for the inaugural Postdoctoral Symposium hosted by the Tarpo Chemistry Department! This one-day symposium aims to bring together postdoctoral researchers, graduate students, and faculty from all divisions of the department to share innovative scientific research, foster collaborations, and promote career development.

The symposium will feature oral presentations, poster sessions, and a keynote speaker. You will hear from a diverse lineup of presenters, ranging from postdocs and 4-5th year grad students preparing for their defense, showcasing their research from across the Tarpo Chemistry Department.
